alethinophidia.pawns

Class ItemProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.pawns.ItemProperties

  • public class ItemProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    It's basically a structure to hold item specific properties such as: length of tail to be extended by eating an item; health addition or loss; score bonus added after eating item; speed up value for items like mushroom, mouse or energy Drink; Whenever snake eats item, game asks ItemProperties what properties it will bestow upon poor creature.
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
